==Escalating annuity== <fin-math> <arguments> <request>get_annuity_escalating</request> <m>12</m> <advance>1</advance> <i_effective>0.1</i_effective> <term>10</term> <escalation_rate_effective>0.03</escalation_rate_effective> <escalation_frequency>2</escalation_frequency> </arguments> </fin-math>
==Mortgage== <fin-math> <parameters><request>get_mortgage_instalment</request><page_id/><m>12</m><i_effective>0.1</i_effective><term>10</term><principal>100000</principal><instalment/><title>Special:FinancialMathematics</title></parameters> </fin-math>
==Par-yield== <fin-math> <parameters><page_id/><CT1_Spot_Rates><item0><delta>0.095310179804325</delta><effective_time>1</effective_time></item0><item1><delta>0.10436001532424</delta><effective_time>2</effective_time></item1><item2><delta>0.113328685307</delta><effective_time>3</effective_time></item2></CT1_Spot_Rates><request>explain_par</request><par_term>2</par_term><title>Special:FinancialMathematics</title></parameters> </fin-math>

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Exam |Title=Financial Mathematics |Examiner=Institute and Faculty of Actuaries |Date=20-April-2015 }}"

revision.text:
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2015|Number=4|Part=i|Marks=4}}
Forward value is present value accumulated = $$9.0161 * 1.05^{(9/12)} = 9.352.$$
Present value is 9.0161.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>10</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.08333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.58333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.05</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=5|Marks=7|Oracle=2128.77|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>1</m><source_m>2</source_m><source_rate>0.06</source_rate><i_effective/></parameters></fin-math>
Present value = 1047.22. Accumulated value = present value * 1.0609^12 = 1047.22 * 1.0609^12 = 2128.78.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>4</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>4</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>12</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>8</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.0609</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

This is the "Exam" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Exam
|Examiner=
|Title=
|Date=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Title | [[Has title::{{{Title|}}}]] |- ! Date | [[Has date::{{{Date|}}}]] |- ! Examiner | [[Has examiner::{{{Examiner|}}}]] |} {{Question-types |Exam={{PAGENAME}} }} {{#ask:[[is_part_of_question::+]][[In exam::{{PAGENAME}}]] |?Has number |?Has part |?Has marks |sort=Has number,Has part |order=ascending,ascending |mainlabel=Question}} [[Category:Exam]]

|Oracle=
